description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget named BarByCategory, which displays a bar chart representing categories and their corresponding data values in a list format. It sorts the data, handles empty data gracefully, and visually emphasizes categories using colored bars.

classes.name: BarByCategory
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a bar chart for category data provided via a map.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for displaying the bar chart, including sorting data, handling empty states, and constructing the bar visualizations.
